section.title: rtpengine.rtpengine_disable_tout
section.para: The time after which rtpengine will try to communicate to an RTP proxy after it has been marked disabled automatically. .

section.title: rtpengine.rtpengine_tout_ms
section.para: The total number of nodes inside a set to be queried before giving up establishing a session.

section.title: rtpengine.queried_nodes_limit
section.para: Timeout value expressed in milliseconds in waiting for reply from RTP proxy.

section.title: rtpengine.rtpengine_retr
section.para: How many times the module should retry to send and receive after timeout was generated.
